text:
If I use

```
{% image "background_image" label='Select a background image', src='{{ content.featured_image }}' %}
```

Any idea how I can use it in place of

```
<div class="col-lg-8 big-image" style="background-image: url({{ content.featured_image }});"></div>
```

So it just replaced the background-image in that div?
are you asking for a way to do this with javascript?
look in the docs for `Export To Template Context`
In general, I did not see any other channel specific to programming other than developer-tools so I posted it here

Iâ€™d put that in <#C2YH119N2|hubl>.
```<div class="col-lg-8 big-image" style="background-image: url({{ widget_data.background_image.src }});"></div>```
